Why Oncle Bob?

  • Deploy in seconds — Point to your folder and go live instantly
  • No configuration needed — Zero hassle, zero servers to manage
  • Works offline-first — Build and test locally before publishing
  • One-click publishing — From local folder to live website in a single click
